Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. This exceptional item is valued at $150 by us, reflecting its quality, functionality, and the time invested in its creation. We believe it could be an excellent addition to your collection or serve as a valuable tool in your daily activities. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, we're extending this opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $130. Don't miss out on this chance to experience the superior quality firsthand. If you're interested, please let me know so we can proceed with the transaction. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $130. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $130
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
